content: {"locationId": "11181", "organizationId": "8717", "name": "Trinity Church/Oasis - Hot Springs", "address1": "670 Panama St", "address2": "", "city": "Hot Springs", "state": "AR", "zipCode": "71913", "country": null, "phone": "501-624-6453", "phoneExt": "", "website": "", "latitude": "34.4682972", "longitude": "-93.0735861", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "", "languages": "", "features": "", "aboutUs": "Our mission here at Trinity Church Oasis is to provide our community with the avenue of a place where they can come to receive assistance in regards to the ever-increasing epidemic of food insecurity.
